e...

I guess that included me... ;-) Last November I sparked a discussion
=
about speciation thresholds, but I haven't been an very active
participant =
since then. That is mainly because the project for which I
was using NEAT i=
s now finished and my paper submitted for review. I
did however promise Der=
ek to share my additions to ANJI when I was
done and this would indeed be t=
he time, but I am not sure whether to
share my ideas about ANJI via the dis=
cussion group or in private
e-mails, because it would be about ANJI and Jav=
a and not so much about
NEAT. But then again ANJI is all about NEAT. Hmmm..=
. I *was* going to
use private e-mails but I may just have convinced myself=
 to use the
discussion group...

As for closing the archives, I am slightly=
 in favor of closing them,
because I know from experience that there is ind=
eed a considerable
threshold having to sign up before posting your thoughts=
, whereas
there is no such threshold if one already has to be signed up bef=
ore
even being able to read the messages. But my favor is not that strong,
=
because I also heard several good arguments for keeping them open.

Greetin=
gs,
Bas
